snippet.title: the Anthurium - Game Promotion Video
snippet.description:
Escape Game "the Anthurium"
You are trapped in an old house.
There are various gimmicks and hidden items that someone set up in the house, so you can't easily escape from there.
Explore the whole of the house, get clues and useful items, and unlock all gimmicks to escape.

Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.cduck.unity.android.anthurium
iOS https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/id1452467167?mt=8
